Class Fleet

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fleet

  • public class Fleet
extends java.lang.Object
    Fleet represents a unique conglomerate of ships
    Author:
    Alexander Kokkosoulis (ots068)

      Default Constructor for Fleet, sets name to ""

        r - registry of ship to be assigned to

      • save

          throws java.io.IOException

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in the case that either of the two destination files dont exist
